attributes.action: Stop the abolition of personal cheques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal by the banking industry to abolish cheques will hit charities hard as there is no convenient alternative method especially as society cheques require two signatures to prevent fraud. Most subscriptions to clubs and charities are made by cheque. This a move for the convience of banks not customers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
